data.author: George Addair
data.quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.

data.author: T.S. Eliot
data.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far it is possible to go.

data.author: Jennifer J. Freeman
data.quote: You are far too smart to be the only thing standing in your way.

data.author: Michael Phelps
data.quote: There will be obstacles. There will be doubters. There will be mistakes. But with hard work, there are no limits.

data.author: Rob Siltanen
data.quote: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.

data.author: Will Rogers
data.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.

data.author: Ira Glass
data.quote: It takes a while. It's gonna take you a while. It's normal to take a while. You just have to fight your way through that.

data.author: Hannalore Hein
data.quote: Be humble and gracious. And be ready to put in the work.

data.author: Alex Jangard
data.quote: Quit talking about what you're wanting to do and go do it. Execute, test, fail, succeed, take action.

data.author: Chinese proverb
data.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

data.author: Thomas Edison
data.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

data.author: Derrick Rose
data.quote: All the days that you wake up you have one job and that's to get better every single day.

data.author: John C. Maxwell
data.quote: The whole idea of motivation is a trap. Forget motivation. Just do it.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.

data.author: William Arthur Ward
data.quote: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.

data.author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf
data.quote: If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.quote: Whether you think you can or whether you think you can't, you're right!

data.author: Will Rogers
data.quote: Even if you are on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.

data.author: Karen Lamb
data.quote: A year from now you will wish you had started today.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.

data.author: Nolan Bushnell
data.quote: The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer.

data.author: Marla Runyan
data.quote: Don't listen to negative influences. Believe in yourself, and show others what you can do. Only You can find your potential.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.

data.author: Henry David Thoreau
data.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

data.author: Michael Jordan
data.quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: I cannot give you the formula for success, but I can give you the formula for failure, which is: try to please everybody.

data.author: T.S. Eliot
data.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far it is possible to go.

data.author: Howard Schultz
data.quote: Believe in your dreams and dream big. And then after you've done that, dream bigger.

data.author: Ann Landers
data.quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.

data.author: Kyle Chandler
data.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door

data.author: Thomas A. Edison
data.quote: Hell, there are no rules here: we're trying to accomplish something.

data.author: Douglas Ivester
data.quote: Never let your memories be greater than your dreams.

data.author: Herman Melville
data.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.

data.author: Sanford Meisner
data.quote: Courage means willing to risk everything.

data.author: Robert F. Kennedy
data.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
